meta.content: Berrien Springs Public Schools is an innovative school district in Berrien County, MI. Consider one of the best school districts in Southwest Michigan, Berrien Springs Public Schools focuses on the learner and high achievement.

meta.name: description
meta.content: Berrien Springs Public Schools is an innovative school district in Berrien County, MI. Consider one of the best school districts in Southwest Michigan, Berrien Springs Public Schools focuses on the learner and high achievement.

a.span: Deaf and Hard of Hearing Program Features

strong.font:
Free School Meals will be available on Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday
​from 11:00-12:00 Noon at the High School Circle Drive and
delivery to River Springs Estates Mobile Home Park Office.

Together, inspiring students to think, learn,
achieve and care in a global community.

div.br: ​Berrien Springs Public Schools believes in access for all individuals with disabilities and strives to make its website accessible to all individuals. If you encounter accessibility issues when using this website, please report the problem to: contactus@homeoftheshamrocks.org or by phone at 269-471-2891. Additional accessibility resources and assistance are available at ADA.gov.

div.p: This website uses marketing and tracking technologies. Opting out of this will opt you out of all cookies, except for those needed to run the website. Note that some products may not work as well without tracking cookies.

div.span: The Berrien Springs Public Schools Board of Education does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex (including sexual orientation and transgender identity), disability, age, religion, height, weight, marital or family status, military status, ancestry, genetic information, or any other legally protected characteristic, (collectively, "Protected Classes") in its programs and activities, including employment opportunities.
